1:
Praise Yahweh!\q1 You who worship Yahweh,
\q1 praise him!
\q1
2:
You who stand at the temple of Yahweh our God in its courtyards, ready to serve him,\q2 praise him !


\q1
3:
Praise Yahweh because he does good things for us;\q2 sing to him because it is a joyful thing to do so.
\q1
4:
He has chosen us, the descendants of Jacob;\q2 he has chosen us Israelites to belong to him.



\q1
5:
I say these things because I know that Yahweh is great;\q2 he is greater than all the gods.
\q1
6:
Yahweh does whatever he desires to do\q2 in heaven, on the earth,
\q2 and in the seas, down to the bottom of the seas.


\q1
7:
He is the one who causes clouds to appear from very distant places on the earth;\q2 he makes lightning bolts to flash with the rain,
\q2 and he brings the winds from the places where he stores them.



\q1
8:
He is the one who killed all the firstborn males in Egypt,\q2 the firstborn of people and of animals.
\q1
9:
There he performed many kinds of miracles\q2 to punish the king and all his officials.


\q1
10:
He attacked many nations\q2 and killed the powerful kings who ruled them:
\q1
11:
Sihon, the king of the Amor people group,\q2 Og, the king of Bashan,
\q2 and all the other kings in the land of Canaan.


\q1
12:
Yahweh gave us their land,\q2 so that it would belong to us, his people Israel, forever.


\q1
13:
Yahweh, your name will endure forever,\q2 and people who are not yet born will remember the great things that you have done.
\q1
14:
Yahweh declares that we, his people, are innocent,\q2 and he acts mercifully toward us.



\q1
15:
But the idols that the other people groups worship are only statues made of silver and gold,\q2 things that humans have made.
\q1
16:
Their idols have mouths, but they cannot say anything;\q2 they have eyes, but they cannot see anything.
\q1
17:
They have ears, but they cannot hear anything,\q2 and they are not even able to breathe.
\q1
18:
The people who make those idols are as powerless as those idols,\q2 and those who trust in those idols can accomplish no more than their idols can!



\q1
19:
My fellow Israelites, praise Yahweh!\q1 You priests who are descended from Aaron, praise Yahweh!
\q1
20:
You men who are descended from Levi, you who assist the priests, praise Yahweh!\q1 All you who have a reverential respect for Yahweh, praise him!
\q1
21:
Praise Yahweh in the temple on Mount Zion in Jerusalem\q2 where he lives!
\q1 Praise Yahweh!
